parameters.name: Depth
parameters.description: Thickness of the end cap

parameters.name: BIsGivenOffset
parameters.description: True to provide an offset value, false to provide a thickness ratio

parameters.name: BIsChamfer
parameters.description: True if end cap feature is chamfered, false if end cap is filleted

parameters.name: OffsetValue
parameters.description: Edge offset value; valid only if BIsGivenOffset is true

parameters.name: WallThicknessRatio
parameters.description: Wall thickness ratio; valid only if BIsGivenOffset is false

parameters.name: ChamferValue
parameters.description: Chamfer distance if BIsChamfer is true, fillet radius if BIsChamfer is false

parameters.name: BIsCornerTreatment
parameters.description: True to chamfer or fillet the end cap corners, false to not; valid only if BIsGivenOffset is false

parameters.name: DepthOffset
parameters.description: Inset distance; valid only if BIsEndCapInward = 2

parameters.name: BIsReverse
parameters.description: True to reverse the offset or thickness ratio, false to not

parameters.name: BIsEndCapInward
parameters.description: Thickness direction as defined in swEndCapThicknessDirection_e

title: IFeatureManager.InsertEndCapFeature3
description: Inserts an end cap feature for one or more pre-selected open ends of a structural member.
signature:
Feature InsertEndCapFeature3( 
   System.Double
Depth
,
   System.Boolean
BIsGivenOffset
,
   System.Boolean
BIsChamfer
,
   System.Double
OffsetValue
,
   System.Double
WallThicknessRatio
,
   System.Double
ChamferValue
,
   System.Boolean
BIsCornerTreatment
,
   System.Double
DepthOffset
,
   System.Boolean
BIsReverse
,
   System.Int32
BIsEndCapInward
)

parameters.name: Depth
parameters.description: Thickness of the end cap

parameters.name: BIsGivenOffset
parameters.description: True to provide an offset value, false to provide a thickness ratio

parameters.name: BIsChamfer
parameters.description: True if end cap feature is chamfered, false if end cap is filleted

parameters.name: OffsetValue
parameters.description: Edge offset value; valid only if BIsGivenOffset is true

parameters.name: WallThicknessRatio
parameters.description: Wall thickness ratio; valid only if BIsGivenOffset is false

parameters.name: ChamferValue
parameters.description: Chamfer distance if BIsChamfer is true, fillet radius if BIsChamfer is false

parameters.name: BIsCornerTreatment
parameters.description: True to chamfer or fillet the end cap corners, false to not; valid only if BIsGivenOffset is false

parameters.name: DepthOffset
parameters.description: Inset distance; valid only if BIsEndCapInward = 2

parameters.name: BIsReverse
parameters.description: True to reverse the offset or thickness ratio, false to not

parameters.name: BIsEndCapInward
parameters.description: Thickness direction as defined in swEndCapThicknessDirection_e

remarks:
Before calling this method, select one or more end
faces
of a structural member in the graphics area.
Instead of using this method, you can pass the faces in an argument array of
IFeatureManager::InsertEndCapFeature2
.
